name: Hive_Mind_MitchPlay
title: Hive Mind MitchPlay: Default
author: MitchPlay
description:
Original Hive Mind mod created by Klonan, Re-made by Mitchplay. 

Take control of the Biters, defend your home planet from the foreign invaders, The Engineers! Build Spawners and influence a pollution based economy, and lead yourself to Victory! 

2 versions of the MitchPlay's Ramake are available, Default & Mayhem

--This download version: Default--

(Default = Max Alien population is 1000 -This version is recommended)

(Mayhem = Max Alien population is 2500 -This version may be unstable and Laggy)

--MitchPlay Discord: https://discord.gg/rhPXFdJmE9

Thank you again Klonan for allowing me to remake this mod!
